com.persistit.exception

Class PersistitException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • com.persistit.exception.PersistitException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BufferSizeUnavailableException, CorruptImportStreamException, CorruptValueException, CorruptVolumeException, DuplicateKeyException, InUseException, InvalidKeyException, InvalidPageAddressException, InvalidPageStructureException, InvalidPageTypeException, MissingThreadException, PersistitClosedException, PersistitInterruptedException, PersistitIOException, PropertiesNotFoundException, ReadOnlyVolumeException, RebalanceException, RecoveryMissingVolumesException, RetryException, TimeoutException, TransactionFailedException, TreeNotFoundException, TruncateVolumeException, VolumeAlreadyExistsException, VolumeClosedException, VolumeFullException, VolumeNotFoundException, WrongVolumeException, WWRetryException

    public class PersistitException
extends Exception
    The superclass for all checked Persistit™ Exceptions. This class can also serve as a wrapper for other Exception types.
    Version:
    1.0
